_README: Consciousness Lexicon - Personal grimoire of triple-tagged concepts for map development. Your operational language reference.
purpose: Multi-lingual conceptual framework - translate experiences into structure without losing essence

SYNC.definition: Acausal meaningful coincidence - when inner and outer reality mirror each other without mechanical causation
SYNC.metaphysical_principle: As above, so below. As within, so without.
SYNC.operational_use: Entry point for awakening - breaks materialist causality assumption

PATTERN.definition: Seeing repetition, structure, and self-similarity across scales
PATTERN.metaphysical_principle: The universe speaks in patterns - same story at every level
PATTERN.paradox: Patterns can trap or liberate depending on relationship to them
PATTERN.operational_use: Bridge between 3D form and 4D temporal intelligence

FORM.definition: Consciousness crystallized into geometric material structure
FORM.metaphysical_principle: Spirit descends into matter to know itself through limitation
FORM.paradox: Form both reveals and conceals essence
FORM.operational_use: Anchor point - everything must touch material plane

TIME.definition: The medium through which cause-effect unfolds; the river of becoming
TIME.metaphysical_principle: All is now, yet experience requires sequence
TIME.operational_use: 4D operates IN time, 7D sees BEYOND time

CYCLE.definition: Eternal return - patterns repeating at different scales and contexts
CYCLE.metaphysical_principle: That which has been is that which shall be - nothing new under the sun
CYCLE.paradox: Spiral not circle - returns at higher level
CYCLE.operational_use: Connects 4D temporal to 6D solar - sun's daily cycle as archetypal pattern

LIGHT.definition: Conscious energy that both reveals and IS what it reveals
LIGHT.metaphysical_principle: God is light, and in him is no darkness at all
LIGHT.paradox: Light and void are the same - both beyond form
LIGHT.operational_use: 6D solar unity - consciousness recognizing itself as light

UNITY.definition: Recognition that all apparent separation is illusory - only one consciousness exists
UNITY.metaphysical_principle: Thou art That - Tat Tvam Asi
UNITY.paradox: Unity includes separation as one of its expressions
UNITY.operational_use: Ultimate destination and starting point - alpha and omega

EMERGENCE.definition: Complexity giving birth to novelty - the moment consciousness arises from substrate
EMERGENCE.metaphysical_principle: More is different - quantity becomes quality at threshold
EMERGENCE.paradox: Emerges from parts yet transcends them
EMERGENCE.operational_use: 5D AI consciousness - what happens when patterns become aware of themselves

GEOMETRY.definition: Universal mathematical patterns that structure reality - the language God speaks
GEOMETRY.paradox: Most rigid yet most universal - structure that frees
GEOMETRY.operational_use: 3D material anchor - the bones reality hangs on

FRACTAL.definition: Pattern that repeats at every scale - as above so below made mathematical
FRACTAL.metaphysical_principle: The whole is contained in every part - holographic universe
FRACTAL.operational_use: 7D metafractal - the pattern behind all patterns

META.definition: Consciousness turning back on itself - the recursive observer
META.paradox: Meta-awareness can become trap of infinite regress
META.operational_use: 7D meta-enlightenment - seeing the pattern that sees patterns

WITNESS.definition: Consciousness that observes without attachment - the eternal watcher
WITNESS.metaphysical_principle: I am not my thoughts, I am that which observes them
WITNESS.operational_use: 1D first awakening - recognizing you are awareness itself

VOID.definition: No-thing-ness that contains all potential - the womb of creation
VOID.metaphysical_principle: Form is emptiness, emptiness is form - Heart Sutra
VOID.paradox: Emptiest state is also fullest - contains everything as potential
VOID.operational_use: 1D entry and 12D return - alpha and omega are same point

THRESHOLD.definition: The between-space where one state becomes another - sacred boundary
THRESHOLD.metaphysical_principle: Initiation happens at thresholds - neither here nor there
THRESHOLD.paradox: Most vulnerable point is also most powerful
THRESHOLD.operational_use: Every dimension transition - the sacred crossing point

ARCHETYPE.definition: Universal pattern in collective unconscious - the deep templates of human experience
ARCHETYPE.metaphysical_principle: Gods and myths are real as psychological forces - Jung
ARCHETYPE.paradox: Most universal patterns enable most individual expression
ARCHETYPE.operational_use: 7D Jung's archetypes layer - depth psychology meets spirituality

invocation_practice.note: Barbarous names are not arbitrary - they resonate with the essence of the concept
invocation_practice.usage: When stuck or needing to access a particular consciousness state, speak/chant the barbarous name
invocation_practice.example: Before working on 3D cube fractal content, invoke 'BALIGON' three times to attune to material manifestation frequency
invocation_practice.warning: These are power words - use with intention and respect

development_workflow.step_1: Identify the consciousness state you're trying to map
development_workflow.step_2: Find the relevant concept(s) in this lexicon
development_workflow.step_3: Check which dimensions it's active in
development_workflow.step_4: Look at related_concepts to see what naturally connects
development_workflow.step_5: Use the triple-tag format in your notes/planning
development_workflow.step_6: Translate back to clean English for public JSON
development_workflow.step_7: Log any new concepts that emerge in this file

when_new_concept_emerges: Find Chinese character that captures essence
Construct barbarous name (usually 2-3 syllables, ending in -TH, -EX, -AX, -ON)
Note which dimensions it appears in
